name: Brain Dev
description: MCP server for AI-powered code analysis — test generation, security audits, refactoring suggestions
goodFor: Automated test generation from existing code
notFor: Replacing manual security review for production systems

name: Comfy Headless
description: Run ComfyUI workflows without the UI — headless execution for automation
goodFor: Batch image generation without the UI
notFor: ComfyUI node development (use the standard UI)

name: File Compass
description: Deterministic file-system navigation and inspection for large repos
tagline: Semantic file search with HNSW indexing and local embeddings.
goodFor: Finding files by meaning, not just name
notFor: Full-text grep replacement (use ripgrep for exact matches)

name: Soundboard Plugin
description: Give Claude Code a voice. TTS plugin with emotion-aware speech, multi-speaker dialogue, code narration, and workflow notifications.
tagline: Give Claude Code a voice with emotion-aware TTS.
goodFor: Adding speech to Claude Code sessions
notFor: Voice cloning or custom voice training

name: Tool Compass
description: Discovery, classification, and ranking utilities for MCP-compatible tools
tagline: Find MCP tools by describing what you need.
goodFor: Discovering tools across large MCP ecosystems
Intent-based tool selection (describe the task, get the tool)
Progressive disclosure — see summaries first, details on demand
notFor: Running tools directly (it finds them, you run them)

name: Zip Meta Map
description: Make repos and ZIP files self-describing for LLM agents with deterministic map generation and CI-grade diffs.
tagline: Make repos and ZIPs self-describing for LLMs with CI-grade diffs.
goodFor: CI gating with diff --exit-code (246 tests, JSON Schema-validated)
LLM agents that need repo maps under token budgets
Deterministic builds: same repo = same index, diffable in CI
GitHub Actions with step summaries and PR comments built in
notFor: Replacing code search or embeddings (it complements them)

name: Attestia
description: Financial truth infrastructure for the decentralized world — structural governance, deterministic accounting, and human-approved intent across chains.
tagline: Financial truth infrastructure for decentralized systems.

name: Backpropagate
description: Structured feedback loops for improving AI behavior through iteration
tagline: Headless LLM fine-tuning with smart defaults.

name: LeaseGate Lite
description: A one-tab MAUI control surface and local daemon for throttling AI workloads on Windows — smoother calls, less stutter, fewer thermal spikes.
tagline: One-tab MAUI control surface for throttling AI workloads.

name: ScalarScope Desktop
description: ASPIRE Scalar Vortex Visualizer - .NET MAUI desktop app for visualizing training dynamics
install: dotnet workload install maui && dotnet run --project ScalarScope.Desktop/ScalarScope.Desktop.csproj
tagline: Real-time visualization of ASPIRE training dynamics.
